analyzed: iddhi pāṭihāriya ādesanā pāṭihāriya anusāsanī pāṭihāriya

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhoti—
analyzed: idha bhikkhave ekaccaḥ aneka vihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti

original: ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti;
analyzed: ekaḥ api hutvā bahudhā hoti bahudhā api hutvā ekaḥ hoti
yāva brahma lokā api kāyena vasam vatta iti

original: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.
analyzed: evam pi te manaḥ ittham pi te manaḥ iti pi te cittanti

original: So bahuñcepi ādisati, tatheva taṁ hoti, no aññathā.
analyzed: saḥ bahuñca ipi ādisati tathā iva tam hoti no aññathā

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco na heva kho nimittena ādisati, api ca kho manussānaṁ vā amanussānaṁ vā devatānaṁ vā saddaṁ sutvā ādisati—
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave ekaccaḥ na ha iva kho nimittena ādisati api ca kho manussānam vā amanussānam vā devatānam vā saddam sutvā ādisati

original: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.
analyzed: evam pi te manaḥ ittham pi te manaḥ iti pi te cittanti

original: So bahuñcepi ādisati, tatheva taṁ hoti, no aññathā.
analyzed: saḥ bahuñca ipi ādisati tathā iva tam hoti no aññathā

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco na heva kho nimittena ādisati, napi manussānaṁ vā amanussānaṁ
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave ekaccaḥ na ha iva kho nimittena ādisati na pi manussānam vā amanussāna

original: vā devatānaṁ vā saddaṁ sutvā ādisati, api ca kho vitakkayato vicārayato vitakkavipphārasaddaṁ sutvā ādisati—
analyzed: vā devatānam vā saddam sutvā ādisati api ca kho vitakkayataḥ vicārayataḥ vitakka vipphāra saddam sutvā ādisati

original: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.
analyzed: evam pi te manaḥ ittham pi te manaḥ iti pi te cittanti

original: So bahuñcepi ādisati, tatheva taṁ hoti, no aññathā.
analyzed: saḥ bahuñca ipi ādisati tathā iva tam hoti no aññathā

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco na heva kho nimittena ādisati, napi manussānaṁ vā amanussānaṁ
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave ekaccaḥ na ha iva kho nimittena ādisati na pi manussānam vā amanussāna

original: vā devatānaṁ vā saddaṁ sutvā ādisati, napi vitakkayato vicārayato vitakkavipphārasaddaṁ
analyzed: vā devatānam vā saddam sutvā ādisati vitakkayataḥ vicārayataḥ vitakka vipphāra sadda

original: sutvā ādisati, api ca kho avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhiṁ samāpannassa cetasā ceto paricca pajānāti—
analyzed: sutvā ādisati api ca kho a vitakkam a vicāram samādhim samāpannassa cetasā cetaḥ paricca pajānāti

original: ‘yathā imassa bhoto manosaṅkhārā paṇihitā imassa cittassa anantarā amukaṁ nāma vitakkaṁ vitakkayissatī’ti.
analyzed: yathā imassa bhoto manaḥ saṅkhārā paṇihitāḥ imassa cittassa anantarā amukam nāma vitakkam vitakkayissati iti

original: So bahuñcepi ādisati, tatheva taṁ hoti, no aññathā.
analyzed: saḥ bahuñca ipi ādisati tathā iva tam hoti no aññathā

original: Evaṁ manasi karotha, mā evaṁ manasākattha.
analyzed: evam manasi karotha mā evam manasā akattha
idam pajahatha idam upasampajja viharatha ati

original: Ye tena nekkhammena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—
analyzed: ye tena nekkhammena samannāgatā sabbe te visuddha cittā anāvila saṅkappā ti

original: “Taṁ kho pana nekkhammaṁ evaṁ āsevitabbaṁ, evaṁ bhāvetabbaṁ, evaṁ bahulīkātabbaṁ, evaṁ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—
analyzed: tam kho pana nekkhammam evam āsevitabba evam bhāvetabba evam bahulīkātabba evam tad anudhamma tā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā ati

original: Ye tena abyāpādena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—
analyzed: ye tena a byāpādena samannāgatā sabbe te visuddha cittā anāvila saṅkappā ti

original: “So kho pana abyāpādo evaṁ āsevitabbo, evaṁ bhāvetabbo, evaṁ bahulīkātabbo, evaṁ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—
analyzed: saḥ kho pana abyāpādaḥ evam āsevitabbaḥ evam bhāvetabbaḥ evam bahulīkātabbaḥ evam tad anudhamma tā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā ati

original: Ye tāya ālokasaññāya samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—
analyzed: ye tāya āloka saññāya samannāgatā sabbe te visuddha cittā anāvila saṅkappā ati

original: “Sā kho pana ālokasaññā evaṁ āsevitabbā, evaṁ bhāvetabbā, evaṁ bahulīkātabbā, evaṁ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—
analyzed: sā kho pana āloka saññā evam āsevitabbā evam bhāvetabbā evam bahulīkātabbā evam tad anudhamma tā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā ati

original: Ye tena avikkhepena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—
analyzed: ye tena avikkhepena samannāgatā sabbe te visuddha cittā anāvila saṅkappā ti

original: “So kho pana avikkhepo evaṁ āsevitabbo, evaṁ bhāvetabbo, evaṁ bahulīkātabbo, evaṁ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—
analyzed: saḥ kho pana avikkhepaḥ evam āsevitabbaḥ evam bhāvetabbaḥ evam bahulīkātabbaḥ evam tad anudhamma tā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā ati

original: Ye tena dhammavavatthānena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—
analyzed: ye tena dhamma vavatthānena samannāgatā sabbe te visuddha cittā anāvila saṅkappā ati

original: “Taṁ kho pana dhammavavatthānaṁ evaṁ āsevitabbaṁ, evaṁ bhāvetabbaṁ, evaṁ bahulīkātabbaṁ, evaṁ tadanudhammatā, sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—
analyzed: tam kho pana dhamma vavatthānam evam āsevitabba evam bhāvetabba evam bahulīkātabba evam tad anudhamma tā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā ati

original: Ye tena ñāṇena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—
analyzed: ye tena ñāṇena samannāgatā sabbe te visuddha cittā anāvila saṅkappā ti

original: “Taṁ kho pana ñāṇaṁ evaṁ āsevitabbaṁ, evaṁ bhāvetabbaṁ, evaṁ bahulīkātabbaṁ, evaṁ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—
analyzed: tam kho pana ñāṇam evam āsevitabba evam bhāvetabba evam bahulīkātabba evam tad anudhamma tā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā ati

original: Ye tena pāmojjena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—
analyzed: ye tena pāmojjena samannāgatā sabbe te visuddha cittā anāvila saṅkappā ati

original: “Taṁ kho pana pāmojjaṁ evaṁ āsevitabbaṁ, evaṁ bhāvetabbaṁ, evaṁ bahulīkātabbaṁ, evaṁ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—
analyzed: tam kho pana pāmojjam evam āsevitabba evam bhāvetabba evam bahulīkātabba evam tad anudhamma tā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā ati

original: Ye tena paṭhamena jhānena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—
analyzed: ye tena paṭhamena jhānena samannāgatā sabbe te visuddha cittā anāvila saṅkappā ti

original: “Taṁ kho pana paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ evaṁ āsevitabbaṁ, evaṁ bhāvetabbaṁ, evaṁ bahulīkātabbaṁ, evaṁ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—
analyzed: tam kho pana paṭhamam jhānam evam āsevitabba evam bhāvetabba evam bahulīkātabba evam tad anudhamma tā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā ati

original: Ye tena arahattamaggena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—
analyzed: ye tena arahatta maggena samannāgatā sabbe te visuddha cittā anāvila saṅkappā ati

original: “So kho pana arahattamaggo evaṁ āsevitabbo, evaṁ bhāvetabbo, evaṁ bahulīkātabbo, evaṁ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—
analyzed: saḥ kho pana arahatta maggaḥ evam āsevitabbaḥ evam bhāvetabbaḥ evam bahulīkātabbaḥ evam tad anudhamma tā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā ati

original: Yā ca iddhi yañca pāṭihāriyaṁ, idaṁ vuccati iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ.
analyzed: yā ca iddhi yat ca pāṭihāriya idam vuccati iddhi pāṭihāriya

original: Yā ca iddhi yañca pāṭihāriyaṁ, idaṁ vuccati iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ.
analyzed: yā ca iddhi yat ca pāṭihāriya idam vuccati iddhi pāṭihāriya

original: Yā ca iddhi yañca pāṭihāriyaṁ, idaṁ vuccati iddhipāṭihāriyanti.
